title: Ancient kite-flying festival takes flight in Siem Reap
description: Some 138 kite flyers from across the country gathered in Siem Reap yesterday for an annual three-day contest aimed at preserving ancient traditions and boosting tourism.The post Ancient kite-flying festival takes flight in Siem Reap appeared first on Khmer Times.

title: Snails and Sediments Reveal the True Age of a Site Occupied By Ancient Humans Who Left Africa
description: Learn about the archaeological site of 'Ubeidiya, now confirmed as one of the oldest areas that humans occupied outside of Africa.

title: Ancient 'Asgard' microbe may have used oxygen long before it was plentiful on Earth, offering new clue to origins of complex life
description: A new study suggests that ancient microbes once cast as oxygen haters may have actually learned to use the gas, offering a clue to how the first complex cells — and, eventually, all plants and animals — evolved.

title: Ancient 'Asgard' microbe may have used oxygen long before it was plentiful on Earth, offering new clue to origins of complex life - Live Science
description: Ancient 'Asgard' microbe may have used oxygen long before it was plentiful on Earth, offering new clue to origins of complex life Live ScienceOxygen metabolism in descendants of the archaeal-eukaryotic ancestor NatureA Major Conundrum In The Origin Of Complex Life Has Just Been Solved IFLScienceHow Microbes Got Their Crawl The New York TimesDiscovery could explain the origin of complex life Semafor

title: Open letter: The EU’s new sustainable investment plan needs to be completely fossil expansion-free
description: Fully excluding new fossil fuel projects from the revised Sustainable Finance Disclosure Regulation (SFDR) is critical to achieving the EU’s climate commitments, safeguarding the integrity of the framework, and strengthening investor confidence, warn 133 organisations and experts in a new multi-stakeholder letter. The post Open letter: The EU’s new sustainable investment plan needs to be completely fossil expansion-free appeared first on EUbusiness.com | EU news, business and politics.
